features.title: Features Designed for the Future Generation
features.description: We don't just provide a QR code, we provide a complete system for managing your business presence with elegance and ease.

items.title: Instant Updates
items.description: Design your digital identity by changing colors, logos, and covers, and link the digital menu to your social media accounts.

items.title: Visitor Analytics
items.description: Track views, geographical areas, and most searched items by your customers.

items.title: Perfect Experience
items.description: Intuitive menu interfaces that open instantly on any smart device.

items.title: Security and Reliability
items.description: Your data is encrypted and protected by the latest technologies, with guaranteed uptime 24/7.

items.title: Full Customization
items.description: Hundreds of ready-made designs or build your own design tailored to your brand identity.

items.title: Multiple Links
items.description: Link your QR code to your social media pages, your website, or even a direct payment system.

howItWorks.title: Steps to Create a Digital Menu with
howItWorks.description: Create a digital menu with easy and quick steps that reflects your restaurant's identity and simplifies the ordering and payment process for your customers.

steps.title: Sign Up Now
steps.description: Create an account with easy and quick steps or sign in directly and quickly using your Google account.

steps.title: Customize Your Design

steps.title: Publish the QR Code
steps.description: Upload the QR code with high quality and print it on the tables or at the entrance of your restaurant.

packages.name: Professional

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about ENS platform in one place.

items.question: How do I update my menu?
items.answer: Through your dashboard, you can modify items, prices, and images with a click of a button, and the change will appear instantly to your customers without needing to change the printed QR code.

items.question: Do I need a crypto wallet to use the service?
items.answer: No, you can register via email or Google account and start directly. We provide traditional payment options in addition to crypto options.

items.question: What is a smart menu?
items.answer: It is an interactive menu that allows your customers to browse meals, view item ratings, and even order directly from the table via their phone.

items.question: Can I link the QR to an external website?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can direct the QR to any external link, or use our integrated and professional menu system.

TermsAndConditions.title: Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy
TermsAndConditions.introduction: Welcome to ENSMENU. By using our website or any of our services, you agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before using the platform.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Welcome to *ENSMENU*. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information when you use the ENSMENU website and digital menu creation services (QR Menu) for restaurants and cafes, including free services and paid subscriptions.

subsectionB.title: b) Activity and Usage Information
subsectionB.visits: Number of visits to the menu

subsectionC.title: c) Payment and Subscription Information
subsectionC.paymentStatus: Payment status (we do not store payment card data, which is handled through certified payment providers)

subsectionD.title: d) Technical Information
subsectionD.content: Technical information such as IP address, browser type, operating system, and other technical data necessary for service operation.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For any inquiries related to Privacy Policy, you can contact us via:

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.introduction: Welcome to ENSMENU. By using our website or any of our services, you agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before using the platform.

definitions.title: 1. Definitions
content: ENSMENU: An electronic platform for creating and managing digital food menus (QR Menu).
User: Any person who creates an account or uses ENSMENU services.
Service: All tools and features provided by the website, whether free or paid.
Subscription: Paid plans that provide additional benefits to users.

serviceTerms.title: 2. Service Usage Terms
content: Users must be 18 years of age or older.
Users must provide accurate and up-to-date information when registering.
Using the platform for any illegal purposes or activities that violate public morals is prohibited.
Users are fully responsible for the content they add to the menu.

accounts.title: 3. Accounts
content: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their login credentials.
ENSMENU reserves the right to suspend or terminate any account if illegal activity or violation of these terms is suspected.
Account sharing with other parties without permission is not allowed.

content.title: 4. Content and Food Menus
content: Users retain full rights to the content they upload.
Users grant ENSMENU a non-exclusive license to use the content solely for the purpose of operating and improving the service.
Adding any offensive content, content that violates laws, or infringes on others' intellectual property rights is prohibited.

subscriptions.title: 5. Subscriptions and Paid Plans
content: ENSMENU offers free and paid plans.
Subscription prices and duration of each plan are clearly stated on the website.
All payments are non-refundable except in cases of proven technical errors from the platform.
ENSMENU reserves the right to modify subscription prices with prior notice to users.

payment.title: 6. Payment and Billing
content: Payments are processed through certified payment service providers.
ENSMENU does not store payment card data.
Users are responsible for paying fees on time to avoid service suspension.

serviceTermination.title: 7. Service Suspension or Termination
content: ENSMENU reserves the right to temporarily suspend or stop the service for maintenance or update purposes.
ENSMENU reserves the right to terminate a user's account in case of terms violation without prior notice.
ENSMENU reserves the right to delete violating content without consulting the user.

liability.title: 8. Liability Limitations
content: The service is provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties.
ENSMENU is not responsible for any direct or indirect losses resulting from service use.
We do not guarantee that the platform is free from errors or temporary downtime.

externalLinks.title: 9. External Links
externalLinks.content: The website may contain links to external sites. ENSMENU is not responsible for the content or policies of those sites.

modifications.title: 10. Modifications to Terms and Conditions
modifications.content: ENSMENU reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Modifications are published on this page, and continued use constitutes implicit agreement to them.

governingLaw.title: 11. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms and Conditions are subject to and interpreted according to the laws applicable in the country where the platform is operated.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.content: For any inquiries related to Terms and Conditions, you can contact us via email: support@ensmenu.com

contact.description: For any inquiries related to Terms and Conditions, you can contact us via:
